structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Acting As Administrator Without License; Penalties
law.text: Whoever acts as a nursing home administrator or represents himself to be a licensed nursing home administrator without having been duly licensed and registered by the board of registration of nursing home administrators shall be punished by a fine of not less than five hundred dollars, or by imprisonment for not more than six months, or both.
